title: Department of Chemistry
bannerCon: Exploring matter through scientific inquiry and experimentation, to drive innovation in chemical sciences.

items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: Department of Chemistry was established in 2008 at Karpagam Academy of Higher Education (KAHE). Our Department offers Postgraduate (M.Sc.) and Ph.D. Programmes. The main objective of the Department is to impart knowledge among the students in core areas of Chemistry. Apart from the core courses, knowledge about the latest trends in Chemistry including Green Chemistry, Medicinal Chemistry, Material Chemistry and Nanochemistry are also included in the regular curriculum. Further, our Department provides training to the Postgraduate students in the sophisticated instruments like UV-Visible, IR Spectrometer, Gas Chromatography, Computational Chemistry tools, Microwave Synthesizer, etc., to fit them to industries and to research organizations like CSIR, DAE, etc. Our Department has also tie-ups with various recognized international/national institutions, and industries for student projects, training and research activities.Department of Chemistry has talented and passionate faculty members whose research areas are Synthetic Organic Chemistry, Photochemistry, Electrochemistry, Advanced Functional Materials, Energy and Water Pollution Emendation. Our Department is equipped with Sophisticated instruments like HPLC, UV-Visible Spectrometer, FT-IR Spectrometer, Gas Chromatographic Analyzer, etc. Faculty members of our Department have been publishing research articles in various reputed journals of American Chemical Society, Royal Society of Chemistry, Wiley, Springer-Nature, and Elsevier etc.,Department of Chemistry established two Centre of Excellences namely, Advanced Battery Research Centre (ABRC) and Centre for Material Chemistry (CMC). ABRC equipped with Computer Controlled battery testers and offering test facilities as per International Standard such as IIS, EN, SAE and ICE. CMC equipped with Sophisticated equipment’s like Fluorescence Spectrophotometer, TG-DTA Thermal analyzer, DSC Thermal Analyzer, UV DRS Spectrophotometer, FT-IR Spectrometer (ATR), and Electrochemical workstation.The Department was supported by DST-TDT, Govt. of India and TNSCST, Govt. of Tamil Nadu through research grants of more than Rs. 81 lakhs.

items.subTitle: Vision
content: To promote, inspire and nurture the fundamentals of Chemistry through PG and Ph. D. courses offered for the students. The Department aspires to excel in chemical education, research and public outreach services.

items.subTitle: Mission
content: To offer the programs in Chemistry education and research.
To promote, inspire and nurture the fundamentals and advances of Chemistry through PG courses.
To transform budding Chemists into productive scientists, excellent teachers, entrepreneurs and innovative independent researchers by offering concept-theory-practical training.
To become a nationally recognized centre of Chemical sciences with a state of art research facilities

content.title: Dr. A Thangamani
content.caption: Professor and Head
content.content: Welcome to the Department of Chemistry, KAHE!Our Department at KAHE is highly active and enthusiastic in teaching and learning Chemistry and doing research in various fields of Chemistry. We are offering Post-Graduate (M.Sc.,) and Doctoral (Ph.D.,) Degree programs in Chemistry. Our courses and research projects create a vibrant learning environment to the students and leverage their knowledge, skills, and shape themselves to excel in their higher studies/careers.Our talented faculty members are actively involved in Chemistry research with diverse applications. Publishing research papers in reputed journals and patents clearly reveal the dedication of our Department.In short, our Department is constantly working with our vision – excelling in teaching and research, and addressing challenges facing society.

basic.title: Faculty
basic.description: Our faculty members are the major cause for our sustained capacity to impart vivacious and value-based education for the student community. This platform paves a pathway to our faculty members to progress their knowledge and to carry the observed concepts to the classrooms and laboratories, thus, serving the students in the department
